description: Audit all 9 agents to discover schemas, validators, standards docs, and QA tools that should be consolidated into papertrail for centralized validation/QA

orchestrator.role: Consolidate all agent audit reports into unified migration manifest
orchestrator.notes: COMPLETE (v2.0) - Consolidated 5/8 agent audits into comprehensive migration manifest. Found 56 files: 39 recommended to move (69.6%). Key findings: coderef-workflow (11 schemas + 3 validators), coderef-testing (9 files universal test infrastructure), coderef-packages (2030 LOC TypeScript validators including P0 breaking-change-detector). CRITICAL: CONFLICT-001 (plan.json duplicate) must be resolved before migration. Total scope: 5000+ LOC, 39 files across 5 projects. Waiting for 3 pending agents to complete.
